about_the_game:
The X-2HX virus, eradicated human life on inhabited soil forcing life on the open sea.

You play as Matthew Cole, a lead bioengineer working on “Sonorous” - a low frequency cure to eradicate the virus from the soil - alongside scientists from around the globe onboard the "Fortune", a floating military research facility.

The only problem – The "Fortune" got shipwrecked in the deep sea, with humanities only hope onboard.

You survived. Your mission: Stay alive and find a way to retrieve Sonorous in an everlasting battle against starvation, thirst and ruthless enemies!



FEATURES


Discover new environments, wildlife and resources as you step into the unknown and search for “Sonorous” in an open world - at land and especially underwater!


Craft weapons, food, resources, tools and much more to aid you in your survival.


Use discovered & crafted weapons to hunt a range of fish or use your skills to craft structures capable of supplying you with your needs!


Build and upgrade your base with a range of utilities such as firepits, storage units, tables and many more! You decide what, where and when to build!


Find nutrition, stay hydrated and limit your injuries. Defend yourself against roaming scavengers looting for resources and a range of wildlife and unknown creatures.


Fighting for survival will improve your abilities over time to go further and deeper, bringing you closer to finding “Sonorous.”

content_descriptors.notes: Involves Gun Violence and Animal Hunting

detailed_description:
The X-2HX virus, eradicated human life on inhabited soil forcing life on the open sea.

You play as Matthew Cole, a lead bioengineer working on “Sonorous” - a low frequency cure to eradicate the virus from the soil - alongside scientists from around the globe onboard the "Fortune", a floating military research facility.

The only problem – The "Fortune" got shipwrecked in the deep sea, with humanities only hope onboard.

You survived. Your mission: Stay alive and find a way to retrieve Sonorous in an everlasting battle against starvation, thirst and ruthless enemies!



FEATURES


Discover new environments, wildlife and resources as you step into the unknown and search for “Sonorous” in an open world - at land and especially underwater!


Craft weapons, food, resources, tools and much more to aid you in your survival.


Use discovered & crafted weapons to hunt a range of fish or use your skills to craft structures capable of supplying you with your needs!


Build and upgrade your base with a range of utilities such as firepits, storage units, tables and many more! You decide what, where and when to build!


Find nutrition, stay hydrated and limit your injuries. Defend yourself against roaming scavengers looting for resources and a range of wildlife and unknown creatures.


Fighting for survival will improve your abilities over time to go further and deeper, bringing you closer to finding “Sonorous.”
name: Sonorous | Deep Down Below

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 | AMD FX-6350
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 | RX 580 (6 GB VRAM or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64bit versions only)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-10875H | AMD Ryzen 7 5800H
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 | AMD RX 6800 / 6GB Ram (6 GB VRAM or better)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: SONOROUS – Deep Down Below is an unforgiving underwater first-person survival game set in a dystopian world. Find your sunken research to save humanity from an eternal life on the open sea in a continuous fight for survival.
